message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a special price of $20,000. I know it's a great fit for your needs and will provide you with significant value.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my needs. I appreciate the offer, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $12,000 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand your position, I'm still unable to meet at $17,000. I would like to propose $14,000 as a compromise.
